description:
The Detection Framework Testbed and Toolkit 
(DFTT) is a signal detection system that uses
automatically generated subspace and correlation detectors. 

DFTT is intended to facilitate the development and testing of algorithms for operating suites of such detectors. 

The software is a generalization of the system described in Harris and Dodge (2011) and has been applied in contexts ranging from local borehole induced seismicity to large-scale teleseismic observations. 

The software includes interactive applications for creating detection configurations, inspecting and 
editing templates, viewing detection statistics, viewing detected signals, classifying detectors and more.
name: Detection Framework Testbed and Toolkit
